Web.title: Create a Simple HTML Page
Web.description: Create an HTML page with a heading, paragraph, and an image.
rules: The page must have a heading using <h1> tag.

Include at least one paragraph using

tag.
Add an image using tag with a valid URL.

Web.title: Create a Navigation Bar
Web.description: Create a navigation bar with links to Home, About, and Contact pages.
rules: Use <nav> tag to create the navigation bar.
Include links to Home, About, and Contact using <a> tags.
Style the navigation bar using basic CSS.

Web.title: Create a Simple Form
Web.description: Create a form with input fields for name, email, and a submit button.
rules: Use <form> tag to create the form.
Include input fields for name and email using <input> tags.
Add a submit button using <button> tag.

Web.title: Create a CSS Styled Button
Web.description: Create a button and style it using CSS.
rules: Use <button> tag to create the button.
Style the button with background color, padding, and border using CSS.

Web.title: Create a Responsive Grid Layout
Web.description: Create a responsive grid layout with three columns that adjusts to one column on smaller screens.
rules: Use CSS Grid to create the layout.
Ensure the layout has three columns on larger screens.
Adjust to one column layout on smaller screens using media queries.

Web.title: Create a Simple CSS Animation
Web.description: Create a div that changes color using CSS animations.
rules: Use <div> tag to create the element.
Apply a CSS animation to change the background color.
The animation should last for 2 seconds and repeat indefinitely.

Web.title: Create a Sticky Footer
Web.description: Create a webpage with a footer that sticks to the bottom of the page.
rules: Use <footer> tag to create the footer.
Ensure the footer stays at the bottom of the page even if there is little content.

Web.title: Create a Responsive Image Gallery
Web.description: Create a responsive image gallery with at least four images.
rules: Use tags to add images.
Ensure the images adjust in size based on screen width.
Use CSS to style the gallery layout.

Web.title: Create a Modal Popup
Web.description: Create a modal popup that appears when a button is clicked.
rules: Use HTML and CSS to create the modal structure.
Use JavaScript to handle the button click event and show the modal.
Include a close button inside the modal to hide it.

Web.title: Create a Simple Todo List
Web.description: Create a simple todo list application using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
rules: Use <input> tags to add new todo items.
Display the todo items in a list.
Allow users to mark items as completed.

Web.title: Create a Responsive Header
Web.description: Create a responsive header with a logo and navigation menu.
rules: Use <header> tag to create the header.
Include a logo image and navigation links.
Ensure the header adjusts layout on smaller screens.

Web.title: Create a CSS Flexbox Layout
Web.description: Create a layout using CSS Flexbox with a header, main content, and footer.
rules: Use Flexbox properties to layout the page.
Ensure the header, main content, and footer are in the correct order.
Style the layout using CSS.

Web.title: Create a Hover Effect on Buttons
Web.description: Create a button with a hover effect using CSS.
rules: Use <button> tag to create the button.
Apply a hover effect using CSS, such as changing the background color.

Web.title: Create a Simple Dropdown Menu
Web.description: Create a dropdown menu that appears when a button is clicked.
rules: Use HTML and CSS to create the dropdown structure.
Use JavaScript to handle the button click event and show the dropdown menu.
Style the dropdown menu with CSS.

Web.title: Create a Responsive Sidebar
Web.description: Create a sidebar that adjusts layout on smaller screens.
rules: Use <aside> tag to create the sidebar.
Ensure the sidebar is visible on larger screens and collapses on smaller screens.
Use CSS and JavaScript for the responsive behavior.

Web.title: Create a Simple Accordion
Web.description: Create an accordion component that expands and collapses sections of content.
rules: Use HTML to structure the accordion.
Use CSS to style the accordion.
Use JavaScript to handle the expand/collapse behavior.

Web.title: Create a Fixed Header
Web.description: Create a webpage with a header that stays fixed at the top while scrolling.
rules: Use <header> tag to create the header.
Apply CSS to fix the header position at the top.
Ensure the content scrolls beneath the header.

Web.title: Create a Simple Slideshow
Web.description: Create a slideshow with at least three images that change automatically.
rules: Use HTML to add the images.
Use CSS to style the slideshow.
Use JavaScript to automatically change images every few seconds.

Web.title: Create a Simple Table
Web.description: Create a table with rows and columns using HTML.
rules: Use <table> tag to create the table.
Include at least three rows and three columns.
Style the table with basic CSS.

Web.title: Create a Simple Calculator
Web.description: Create a simple calculator that performs basic arithmetic operations.
rules: Use HTML to create the calculator structure.
Use CSS to style the calculator.
Use JavaScript to handle the calculations.
